summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 37th Avenue Northeast and 38th Avenue Northeast, each from East 55th Street to East 57th Street, and cer tain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7753 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
